comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
"80 DAYS"  B-24D  41-24055     14AF  308BG  374BS
One of the original cadre of 308BG Liberators in China
Standing, L-R: John Malen (N), Dean Huffman (P), Stanley Robinson (B), Dale Younger (CP)
Kneeling, L-R:  Don Schell (armorer-ball turret), Eugene Odermutt (radio), Tony Tricoli (top turret), Gerard Labrie (asst. radio), Larry Cooney (tail turret), John Stambaugh (engineer).
